metadataAttributes.Title: Google Cloud Fundamentals: Core Infrastructure
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Google Cloud Fundamentals: Core Infrastructure introduces important concepts and terminology for working with Google Cloud. Through videos and hands-on labs, this course presents and compares many of Google Cloud's computing and storage services, along with important resource and policy management tools.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Google Compute Engine,Google App Engine (GAE),Google Cloud Platform,Cloud Computing,
